name: Storm Season
description:
My solo entry for the 3rd GoedWare Game Jam. 

The theme was: "ENHANCE"

I turned that theme into a game where you have to enhance your coastal defense against the rising water during the "Storm Season". 

Goal

Keep the objectives from flooding!

Try to keep the land dry for as many days as possible. Unfortunately there is no real winning condition (time constraints), but you can lose when all your objectives are flooded by the storms 😈.

Controls

I'll try to explain and show you in-game, but here's a summary anyway:

Camera Movement: WASD or Arrow keys and Q an E for rotation

Menu: Escape 

Select: Left Click

Deselect: Right Click

Build/Demolish:  Left Click

Rotate building block: Z

Choose another block (for example a corner and corner connection) : X

Press "End of Day" button to get the storm started 😊

NOTE: Unfortunately, it's not very clear in the game and did not have the time to automate it, but you can choose from four different block types for the dikes with "X" key to make your dikes fit together nicely. Namely: a normal straight block. A block with 1 diagonal side to connect to a straight block or corner block. A block with 2 slanted sides to connect to 2 straight blocks or corner blocks and a corner block to connect to the blocks with diagonal sides. Rotate them with "Z" to make nice formations.

There is still a lot I would have liked to do, but unfortunately no time left . But the base idea is implemented. There are also some bugs: for building and placing, among others. But I hope you will still enjoy it :)

* I can not win any prices during the Game Jam as Host, but I would appreciate any feedback on the game😊!
